BarchartFeedClient - Class in com.barchart.feed.client.provider
The entry point for Barchart data feed services.

bindFeedStateListener(FeedStateListener) - Method in class com.barchart.feed.client.provider.BarchartFeedClient
Applications which need to react to the connectivity state of the feed instantiate a FeedStateListener and bind it to the client.
bindTimestampListener(TimestampListener) - Method in class com.barchart.feed.client.provider.BarchartFeedClient
Applications which require time-stamp or heart-beat messages from the data server instantiate a DDF_TimestampListener and bind it to the client.

setFeedEventPolicy(DDF_FeedEvent, EventPolicy) - Method in class com.barchart.feed.client.provider.BarchartFeedClient
Users wishing to modify the feed client's response to feed connectivity or other events can bind an instance of EventPolicy to a specific DDF_FeedEvent.
shutdown() - Method in class com.barchart.feed.client.provider.BarchartFeedClient
Shuts down the data feed and clears all registered market takers.

T
